Recipes.title: Simple Omelette Recipe
Recipes.description: An easy and quick dish, perfect for any meal. This classic omelette combines beaten eggs cooked to perfection, optionally filled with your choice of cheese, vegetables, or meats.
ingredients: Optional fillings: cheese, diced vegetables, cooked meats, herbs

instructions.Beat the eggs: in a bowl, beat the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper until they are well mixed. You can add a tablespoon of water of milk for a fluffier texture.
instructions.Heat the pan: Place a non-stick frying pan over medium heat and add butter or oil
instructions.Cook the omelette: Once the butter is melted an bubbling, pour in the eggs evenly coat the surface.
instructions.Add fillings (optional): When the eggs begin to set at the edges but are still slightly runny in the middle, sprinkle your chosen fillings over one half of the omelette.
instructions.Fold and serve: As the omelette continues to cook, carefuly lift one edge and fold it over the fillings. Let it cook fon another minute, then slide it onto a plate.
instructions.Enjoy: Serve hot, with additional salt and pepper if needed
